name: Pixel Adventure (itch) (Nicompany)
description:
Epic pixel adventure!

The game was made on the theme "It makes sense"

There are many items in the game that, at first meaning, do not make any sense (for example, a coin in the first level), but, moving to a new level, you understand that they were not there in vain (the same example with a coin is on the next level, you can buy a spear for it, which doesn’t seem to make sense either, but that’s until you meet zombies on the third level!)

The first level: You need to use your brains a little on how to get to the coin, because it will help you acquire weapons in the future! A little hint - you need to click on the mushroom, but where to get this mushroom is your task

The second level: Get to the store, buy your long-awaited spear!

The third level: Prevent zombie balloons and zombie squares from attacking the castle!

This wave of 30 enemies is heading your way, get your weapons out!

ALL GRAPHIC AND CODE  WAS MADE BY NICOMPANY 

(15 Y.O. SOLO DEVELOPER)
